title: ColdArchiveBucketEntryType
description:
ColdArchiveBucketEntryType is an XDR Enum defines as:

```text enum ColdArchiveBucketEntryType { COLD_ARCHIVE_METAENTRY     = -1,  // Bucket metadata, should come first. COLD_ARCHIVE_ARCHIVED_LEAF = 0,   // Full LedgerEntry that was archived during the epoch COLD_ARCHIVE_DELETED_LEAF  = 1,   // LedgerKey that was deleted during the epoch COLD_ARCHIVE_BOUNDARY_LEAF = 2,   // Dummy leaf representing low/high bound COLD_ARCHIVE_HASH          = 3    // Intermediary Merkle hash entry }; ```
